( Bloomberg)-- Chrysler Group LLC Chief Executive Officer Sergio Marchionne says a remark he made yesterday in reference to interest rates being charged on loans provided by the U.S. and Canadian governments was "inappropriate." I regret the remark, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement posted on Chrysler's website.
